before_start:
Prepare 5 μM primer solutions:

 

ITS2 primers used in the 1st PCR:

ITS2-4R GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCTNNNNNNTCCTCCGCTTATTGATATGC

ITS2-S2F ACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGCTCTTCCGATCTNNNNNNATGCGATACTTGGTGTGAAT

 

Indexing primers used in the 2nd PCR (xxxxxxxx - index):

AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCTACACxxxxxxxxACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGC

CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATxxxxxxxxGTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGC

materials.reagent_name: Q5 Hot Start High-Fidelity DNA Polymerase - 100 units

protocol_affiliation: Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences
affiliation: W. Szafer Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences

sub_authors.affiliation: Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences
Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences

authors_list.name: Tomasz Suchan
authors_list.affiliation: Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences

guidelines: Perform reactions in small batches until you are confident that there is no cross-contamination among the samples. Including isolation blanks and PCR blanks is crucial for the quality control.
status_info: Corrected the amount of primers in the 2nd PCR reaction

components.data: Vortex the butterfly in 50 μl of water with 0.1% SDS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Vortex the butterfly in 50 μl of water with 0.1% SDS.

source_data.body: Add blank sample at this step (= "isolation blank")

source_data.description: Prepare the mix:
Prepare the mix:
Evaporate water in speedvac.

components.data: Add 5 μl of the Phire Plant Direct sample buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 5 μl of the Phire Plant Direct sample buffer.
Spin max speed for 2 min.

components.data: Perform AMPure purification with ratio 1x. Elute in 10 μl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Perform AMPure purification with ratio 1x. Elute in 10 μl.

source_data.protocol_affiliation: Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences
source_data.affiliation: W. Szafer Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences

versions.affiliation: W. Szafer Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences
W. Szafer Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences

authors_list.name: Tomasz Suchan
authors_list.affiliation: Institute of Botany, Polish Academy of Sciences

source_data.guidelines: The protocol below works for 200 μl PCR tubes or plates. If working with 1.5 ml tubes, use larger volumes of EtOH for the washes (step 6 and 7) and Tris/water for the final elution (step 9).

components.data: Remove beads from the fridge, equilibrate to the room temperature, mix thoroughly but do not vortex.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove beads from the fridge, equilibrate to the room temperature, mix thoroughly but do not vortex.

components.data: Add desired ratio of AMPure beads to the DNA to be purified and mix well by pipetting.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add desired ratio of AMPure beads to the DNA to be purified and mix well by pipetting.
Incubate 5 minutes.
Place on the magnetic rack.

components.data: Let it stand for 5 minutes on the rack, aspirate and discard supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Let it stand for 5 minutes on the rack, aspirate and discard supernatant.

components.data: Add 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% EtOH, incubate 30 seconds, aspirate and discard EtOH.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% EtOH, incubate 30 seconds, aspirate and discard EtOH.

components.data: Repeat the wash: add 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% EtOH, incubate 30 seconds, aspirate and discard EtOH.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat the wash: add 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% EtOH, incubate 30 seconds, aspirate and discard EtOH.

components.data: Wait until the pellet dries out completely. DO NOT remove the plate/tubes from the magnetic rack, as the dried AMPure might pop out from the tubes!
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wait until the pellet dries out completely. DO NOT remove the plate/tubes from the magnetic rack, as the dried AMPure might pop out from the tubes!

components.data: Add desired volume of Tris 10 mM or water, wetting the dried AMPure pellets (add 1 μl to the final volume to avoid pipetting out the beads)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add desired volume of Tris 10 mM or water, wetting the dried AMPure pellets (add 1 μl to the final volume to avoid pipetting out the beads)
Remove from the magnetic rack.
Resuspend by pipetting or vortexing.

components.data: Incubate 10 minutes, incubating in 37°C can improve DNA yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate 10 minutes, incubating in 37°C can improve DNA yield.
Place on the magnetic rack.

components.data: Let it stand for 5 minutes, pippete out and save supernatant. The eluted DNA is in the supernatant, do not discard it!
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Let it stand for 5 minutes, pippete out and save supernatant. The eluted DNA is in the supernatant, do not discard it!

components.data: Run the PCR program: 30 s denaturation at 98°C; 12 cycles of denaturation at 98 °C for 10 s, combined annealing and extension at 72°C for 30 s (shuttle PCR); the final extension at 72°C for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run the PCR program: 30 s denaturation at 98°C; 12 cycles of denaturation at 98 °C for 10 s, combined annealing and extension at 72°C for 30 s (shuttle PCR); the final extension at 72°C for 5 min.
Check profiles on a gel.

components.name: Expected result

source_data.description: Pool all the samples together.

components.data: Perform AMPure purification with ratio 1x. Elute in 100 μl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Perform AMPure purification with ratio 1x. Elute in 100 μl.

Incubate 5 minutes.

source_data.description: Repeat the wash: add 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% EtOH, incubate 30 seconds, aspirate and discard EtOH.

components.name: Description

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add desired volume of Tris 10 mM or water, wetting the dried AMPure pellets (add 1 μl to the final volume to avoid pipetting out the beads)
Remove from the magnetic rack.
Resuspend by pipetting or vortexing.

components.data: Incubate 10 minutes, incubating in 37°C can improve DNA yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate 10 minutes, incubating in 37°C can improve DNA yield.
Place on the magnetic rack.

components.data: Let it stand for 5 minutes, pippete out and save supernatant. The eluted DNA is in the supernatant, do not discard it!
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Let it stand for 5 minutes, pippete out and save supernatant. The eluted DNA is in the supernatant, do not discard it!

components.data: Check the concentration using Qubit and the profile using Tapestation/Fragment Analyzer. Calculate molarity from that and proceed to the sequencing. Add 15% PhiX to the sequencing run.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Check the concentration using Qubit and the profile using Tapestation/Fragment Analyzer. Calculate molarity from that and proceed to the sequencing. Add 15% PhiX to the sequencing run.

components.data: Run the PCR program: initial denaturation at 98°C for 5 min; 20 cycles of denaturation at 98°C for 40 s, annealing at 49°C for 40 s and elongation at 72°C for 40 s; followed by a final extension step at 72°C for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run the PCR program: initial denaturation at 98°C for 5 min; 20 cycles of denaturation at 98°C for 40 s, annealing at 49°C for 40 s and elongation at 72°C for 40 s; followed by a final extension step at 72°C for 5 min.

components.data: Add 1 μl of the sample to 49 μl of the mix. Use water instead of the sample for the blanks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 μl of the sample to 49 μl of the mix. Use water instead of the sample for the blanks.

source_data.body: Add another blank sample at this step (= "PCR blank")

components.data: Add 1 μl of the template to 7 μl of the mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 μl of the template to 7 μl of the mix.

components.data: Add 1 μl of each 5 uM primer (forward and reverse).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 μl of each 5 uM primer (forward and reverse).

source_data.body: Use different pair of indexed primers for each sample.
